snippet: The Chevrolet Spark suggests a road to Damascus experience for G.M., as it turns away from relying on large S.U.V.’s for its profits. But while the Spark is about the slowest thing on wheels, its very existence says something good about the...
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2013 Chevrolet Spark.
lead_paragraph: The Chevrolet Spark suggests a road to Damascus experience for G.M., as it turns away from relying on large S.U.V.’s for its profits. But while the Spark is about the slowest thing on wheels, its very existence says something good about the company.

headline.seo: Korean-Flavored Chevy Is Thrifty and City-Smart
